column3: is a member of the [[Mythopoeic Society]] for which he has been editor of the magazine ''[[Mythprint]]''
column5: member of the board of directors
column6: and chair of the annual conference. He has also written a large number of books reviews and compiled bibliographies and reader guides to the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column8: and other [[Inklings]]. He is furthermore a member of the editorial board of ''[[Tolkien Studies]]''.

column4: with his wife and two cats.

column2: see [http://home.earthlink.net/~dbratman/bibl.html David Bratman's bibliography on his own site].''
